summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the purchase, for park, open space, and recreation purposes, of real property commonly known as a portion of the former Crown Hill Elementary School, located at 9089 Holman Road Northwest, from Seattle School District No. 1, authorizing acceptance of the deed, authorizing the creation of an Opportunity Fund Project consistent with the requirements of Ordinance 120024, making appropriations, amending the 2008-2013 Capital Improvement Program, and authorizing the loan of funds from the City's Consolidated (Residual) Cash Pool, or its participating funds, to the 2000 Parks Levy Fund, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
